name: recaR esreveR | Reverse Racer
description:
This is my entry  for the 2023 Coding Blocks Game J-J-J-Jamuary which  had the theme "Everything is backwards".

For this I chose to  create a hillclimb racer where the main  direction of travel was leftwards (backwards to traditional hillclimb games) on top of this, the score starts at a random value and reduces for each flip, or sustained airtime. 

The target is to reach the goal of each level with as close to 0 score as possible. 

Audio samples are from these sources:

Freesound - "engine_idle_loop_1.wav" by RichieMcMullen

Freesound - "Free Music Background Loop 003 - Var 03" by Slaking_97

Freesound - "Explosion.wav" by Nbs Dark

Freesound - "3 Men Cheering" by jbeetle
